snippet: Wayne Ellington hit seven 3-pointers and scored 25 points, both career highs, as Memphis won at home against the defending champions.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Memphis Grizzlies defeat visiting Miami Heat, 104-86,  for their fifth straight win; other basketball scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Wayne Ellington hit seven 3-pointers and scored 25 points, both career highs, as Memphis won at home against the defending champions.

headline.seo: Memphis Grizzlies Win 5th in Row, Beating Miami Heat
headline.main: Grizzlies Win Fifth in Row, Topping Heat
headline.print_headline: Grizzlies Win Fifth in Row, Topping Heat
